Create gateway/database.py with async session factory
Database connectivity verified with test query

features.description: Phase 2: Create SQLAlchemy models (identity, credential, grant, verification)
acceptance_criteria: Identity model: wallet_address, pda_address, owner_pubkey, commitment hash, metadata_uri, timestamps, verification_bits, recovery_counter, bump
Credential model: credential_id, pda_address, owner_wallet (FK), credential_type, claims_hash (32 bytes), issuer_did, issued_at, expiry, metadata_uri, revoked, bump
AccessGrant model: grant_id, pda_address, credential_pda (FK), grantor/grantee wallets, purpose, expires_at, field_mask (u64), revoked, bump
Verification model: verification_id, wallet_address, credential_type, overall_status, progress, steps (JSONB), error, timestamps
All indexes and foreign keys properly defined
No sensitive data in models (hashes and URIs only)

features.description: Phase 3: Implement PDA derivation service (deterministic, matches Solana logic)
acceptance_criteria: Use solders library for deterministic derivation matching Solana
PDA derivation logic tested and verified

features.description: Phase 4: Create repository layer (CRUD operations for all entities)
acceptance_criteria: Create gateway/repositories/identity_repo.py with create, get, update, set_verification_bit, get_by_pda methods
Create gateway/repositories/credential_repo.py with create, get, list_by_owner, update_revocation methods
Create gateway/repositories/grant_repo.py with create, get, list_by_credential, revoke methods
Create gateway/repositories/verification_repo.py with create, get, update_status, list_pending methods
All repositories use async/await with SQLAlchemy session
Repository methods tested with mock database

features.description: Phase 5: Replace in-memory stores with database operations in route handlers
acceptance_criteria: gateway/routes/identity.py - Replace in-memory store with IdentityRepository
gateway/routes/credentials.py - Replace in-memory store (line 9) with CredentialRepository
gateway/routes/verification.py - Replace in-memory store (line 10) with VerificationRepository
gateway/routes/grants.py - Replace in-memory store (line 10) with GrantRepository
API contract unchanged - only internal implementation changed
